meanings.definition: To impregnate or combine with carbon.
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith will carburize the iron to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: Steel manufacturers often carburize the metal to improve its hardness.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if I can carburize this pencil to turn it into a diamond!
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed seemed to carburize his spirit with unwavering strength.
meanings.sent5: The process of carburizing the metal involves infusing it with carbon atoms.

meanings.definition: To treat or combine with carbon in making steel.
meanings.sent1: The factory will carburize the steel beams for the new building.
meanings.sent2: In order to increase durability, engineers often carburize steel components.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally carburized my toast this morning, and now it's extra crispy!
meanings.sent4: Her words seemed to carburize his resolve, making him even more determined.
meanings.sent5: The ancient technique of carburizing steel has been used for centuries in metalworking.
